content: APIXCASH (APX) project launched on 22th, Sept 2022, when the genesis block got mined, We are an open-source project designed to enable instant payments to ayone around the world.Coin specificationsCoin name: ApixcashCoin Ticker: APXCoin Symbol: Ñ¦Algorithm: X16Rv2 Average block time: 1 minutesBlock Reward: 5 APXMax Supply: 50.000.000 APXPremine: noneICO: noneP2P Port: 6061RPC Port: 5061APIX Website & Social LinksWebsite: https://apix.cashExplorer: https://explorer.apix.cashGithub: https://github.com/apixcashTwitter: https://twitter.com/apixcashDiscord: https://discord.gg/THyHYxnJYxDownload WalletsLinux & WindowsAPIXCASH Market ExchangesQuoteAPIXCASH Official Markethttps://exchange.apix.cash/exchange/APX_BTChttps://exchange.apix.cash/exchange/APX_DOGEhttps://exchange.apix.cash/exchange/APX_LTChttps://exchange.apix.cash/exchange/APX_TRXAPIXCASH Secondary Exchangehttps://www.nasadax.com/market/apxusdthttps://www.nasadax.com/market/apxbtchttps://www.nasadax.com/market/apxltchttps://www.nasadax.com/market/apxtrxDirectoryMinerstatsPoolbayMiningPoolStatsPlz Support It!This thread is a wild thought from our team, not to start a dispute, any criticism or insult is allowed, but do it wisely with the intention to improve and not to bring down.
